hanzi-su-wiki:
績

Значения

Заслуга, подвиг; успехи, достижения; пряжа

Мнемоника

Прясть нитки 糸 заставляли женщин. Плохо работали — их наказывали 責, хорошо — награждали. Заслуга по завершении дела.

Варианты

绩
purpleculture_pinyin:
jì
to spin (hemp etc); merit; accomplishment; Taiwan pr. [ji1]
крутить (конопля и т. д.); цена; достижение; Тайвань пр. [ji1]

heisig_chinese_memo: Spidey's exploits are world famous but still The Daily Bugle's pages give him responsibility for every problem out there and praise none of his accomplishments.
heisig_constituent: exploits, thread, spiderman, blame, grow up, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: Spidey´s exploits are world famous but still The Daily Bugle´s pages blame him for every problem out there.
koohiiStory2: [Geek alert] A lot of modern software is full of exploits which can be abused by hackers. I blame multi-threading.
jp_example_words:
業績(ぎょうせき): achievement, performance, results, work, contribution
紡績(ぼうせき): spinning
功績(こうせき): achievements, merit, meritorious service, meritorious deed
実績(じっせき): achievements, actual results
成績(せいせき): results, record
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Taking a piece of thread you blame the exploits of your past on poor judgment. You tie this thread around your finger to remind you of all the exploits you accomplished in your day. Most of them weren’t actually on purpose, so you blame them on poor judgment and accident.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Think up what exploits you accomplished. What sort of things might you have done, but not quite on purpose? Think about how it feels to be exalted for such exploits that were but mere accidents.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: One of your exploits was when you got dressed in the dark and were wearing funny clothes and everyone thought that it was sexy (せき). The newspapers and fashion agencies couldn’t get enough of your sexy style.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine setting this sexy fashion trend on accident. Imagine what you were wearing when you got dressed in the dark. Probably a pretty strange, mismatched outfit.
Ru_Notes:
Фонетик: 責 (せめる、セキ ответственность).
Не путать: 積 (つむ、セキ объём, произведение), 漬 (つける、シ мариновать), 債 (サイ долг).

  • результат, достижения, успехи, успеваемость (в занятиях)
    • warodai
    功績こうせき
  • заслуга, подвиг
    • warodai
    実績じっせき
  • реальные результаты, фактические успехи
    • warodai
Ru_Radicals: 亠 (крышка), ハ, 土 (земля), 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 目 (глаз), 糸 (нить), 貝 (раковина)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if you torture (責) the thread (糸) he can achieve anything
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Spidey accepts responsibility for taking care of tough criminals.  He has a long list of accomplishments.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "糸", " Responsibility " sound. The original meaning is to twist hemp into thread or rope. "Said Wen": "Achievement, Ji Ye. Cong Shi, blame." Such as "Lu Shi Chunqiu. Love Class": "Departed to farm, and his wife has a relationship, so I see it for the people." "Han Shu. "Shihuo Zhi": "In winter, the people enter, the women are in the same lane, and they follow the night."

In ancient books, " Fang " and " Ji " are often used together, such as "Mo Zi. Fei Le Shang: "A matter of making a woman do it, and a waste woman spinning and weaving." "Historical Records. "Fair Standards": "The domestic sergeant has insufficient food and wages, and women do not have enough clothing to spin." " Spinning " mainly means spinning, and can also be used for hemp and cotton, while " ji " means hemp. "poetry. Bin Feng. "July", "August Carrying Performance", "Mao Zhuan": "Carrying performance, silk matter is finished, but hemp things arise." Chen Huan of the Qing Dynasty, "Shi Mao's Biography": "Silk refers to spinning, hemp refers to Ji, Silk is made into silk, and hemp is made into cloth.” (see Wang Fengyang)

" Achievement " by extension means merit and career. "Er Ya. Interpretation: "Achievement, merit." Such as "Poetry. Daya. "The King of Wen Shengsheng": "Feng Shui Dong Zhu, Wei Yu's achievement." Mao Chuan: "Achievement, the emperor of the industry." "Zuo Zhuan. "The Twelfth Year of Xuan Gong": "Xia June Yimao, Jin Xunlin's father and master and Chu Zi fought at Pi, but Jin was defeated."

" Performance " also means to continue and inherit. "Er Ya. Interpretation: "Achievement, succession." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "The First Year of Zhao Gong": "Ziqi also made great achievements and protected the people."
humanum_short_description_en: From "糸", " responsibility " sound. The original meaning is to twist hemp into thread or rope.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「責」聲。本義是即把麻搓成綫或繩。《說文》：「績，緝也。从糸，責聲。」如《呂氏春秋．愛類》：「故身親耕，妻親績，所以見致民利也。」《漢書．食貨志》：「冬，民既入，婦人同巷，相從夜績。」

　　古書中「紡」和「績」經常連用，如《墨子．非樂上》：「使婦人為之，廢婦人紡績織紝之事。」《史記．平準書》：「海內之士力耕不足糧饟，女子紡績不足衣服。」「紡」主要表示紡絲，也可以用於麻、綿等，而「績」則表示績麻。《詩．豳風．七月》「八月載績」，《毛傳》：「載績，絲事畢而麻事起矣。」清代陳奐《詩毛氏傳疏》：「絲曰紡，麻曰績，絲所成曰帛，麻所成曰布。」（參王鳳陽）

　　「績」引申表示功績、事業。《爾雅．釋詁》：「績，功也。」如《詩．大雅．文王有聲》：「豐水東注，維禹之績。」毛傳：「績，業皇大也。」《左傳．宣公十二年經》：「夏六月乙卯，晉荀林父帥師及楚子戰于邲，晉師敗績。」

　　「績」還表示繼續、承繼。《爾雅．釋詁》：「績，繼也。」如《左傳．昭公元年》：「子盍亦遠績禹功而大庇民乎。」
humanum_short_description: 從「糸」，「責」聲。本義是即把麻搓成綫或繩。

從「 糸 」，「 責 」聲。本義是即把麻搓成綫或繩。《說文》：「績，緝也。从糸，責聲。」如《呂氏春秋．愛類》：「故身親耕，妻親績，所以見致民利也。」《漢書．食貨志》：「冬，民既入，婦人同巷，相從夜績。」 古書中「 紡 」和「 績 」經常連用，如《墨子．非樂上》：「使婦人為之，廢婦人紡績織紝之事。」《史記．平準書》：「海內之士力耕不足糧饟，女子紡績不足衣服。」「 紡 」主要表示紡絲，也可以用於麻、綿等，而「 績 」則表示績麻。《詩．豳風．七月》「八月載績」，《毛傳》：「載績，絲事畢而麻事起矣。」清代陳奐《詩毛氏傳疏》：「絲曰紡，麻曰績，絲所成曰帛，麻所成曰布。」（參王鳳陽） 「 績 」引申表示功績、事業。《爾雅．釋詁》：「績，功也。」如《詩．大雅．文王有聲》：「豐水東注，維禹之績。」毛傳：「績，業皇大也。」《左傳．宣公十二年經》：「夏六月乙卯，晉荀林父帥師及楚子戰于邲，晉師敗績。」 「 績 」還表示繼續、承繼。《爾雅．釋詁》：「績，繼也。」如《左傳．昭公元年》：「子盍亦遠績禹功而大庇民乎。」

" Spinning" mainly means spinning, and can also be used for hemp and cotton, while " ji" means hemp. "poetry. Bin Feng. 績字的基本解释

績
jì
见“绩”。

績字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jī］
［《廣韻》則歷切，入錫，精。］
亦作“勣1”。“绩1”的繁体字。
(1)缉麻。把麻析成细缕捻接起来。
(2)蚕吐丝。
(3)继续。
(4)功绩；事业。
(5)通“積”。

績字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　績； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页936第23
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?則歷切，音勣。【說文】絹也。【詩·陳風】不績其麻。　又【書·堯典】庶績咸熙。【傳】績，功也。　又【詩·大雅】維禹之績。【傳】績，業也。　又【爾雅·釋詁】績，繼也。　又事也，成也。

績字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
績字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jī］
["Guangyun" is a historical cut, with tin and fineness. ]
Also known as "product 1". The traditional characters of "ache 1".
(1) Seize hemp. Split the hemp into fine strands and twist them together.
(2) Silkworm spinning.
(3) Continue.
(4) Merit; career.
(5) Through "product".

jì
вм. 绩
Radicals: 糸, 責  (thread, blame)
Meaning Mnemonic
Taking a piece of thread you blame the exploits of your past on poor judgment. You tie this thread around your finger to remind you of all the exploits you accomplished in your day. Most of them weren’t actually on purpose, so you blame them on poor judgment and accident.
Think up what exploits you accomplished. What sort of things might you have done, but not quite on purpose? Think about how it feels to be exalted for such exploits that were but mere accidents.
Reading Mnemonic
One of your exploits was when you got dressed in the dark and were wearing funny clothes and everyone thought that it was sexy (せき). The newspapers and fashion agencies couldn’t get enough of your sexy style.
Imagine setting this sexy fashion trend on accident. Imagine what you were wearing when you got dressed in the dark. Probably a pretty strange, mismatched outfit.
